sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEIGNIOR, is, in its general ſignification, the same with lord; but is particularly uſed for the lord of the fee as of a manor, as sei gneur among the feudiſts is he who grants a fee or benefit out of the land to another ; and the reaſon is, becauſe having granted away the uſe and profit of the land, the property or dominion he ſtill retains in himſelf.
